name: Village Super Market, Inc.
description: Village Super Market, Inc. operates a chain of grocery stores primarily in the northeastern United States. Founded in 1937, the company has built a strong reputation for providing quality products and exceptional customer service. Under the ShopRite brand, Village Super Market offers a wide array of products, including fresh produce, meats, dairy, and baked goods, as well as a variety of private label items. The company is committed to sourcing local products whenever possible, supporting local farmers and suppliers. In addition to traditional grocery offerings, Village Super Market also provides online shopping and delivery services, adapting to the changing preferences of consumers. With a focus on community engagement, the company participates in various local initiatives and charitable events, reinforcing its commitment to serving the communities in which it operates. Village Super Market continues to innovate within the grocery sector, implementing sustainable practices and technology-driven solutions to enhance the shopping experience. The company's mission is to deliver value and quality to its customers while maintaining a strong connection to the community.

seo.meta_title: Village Super Market, Inc. | Quality Grocery Shopping
seo.meta_description: Explore Village Super Market, Inc., a leading grocery store chain in the Northeastern USA, known for its quality products and community engagement.

faq.question: What is Village Super Market known for?
faq.answer: Village Super Market is known for its grocery stores offering quality products, especially under the ShopRite brand.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Village Super Market?
faq.answer: Richard S. G. Kranitz is the CEO of Village Super Market, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Village Super Market headquartered?
faq.answer: Village Super Market is headquartered in Springfield, New Jersey, USA.

faq.question: What are the main products offered by Village Super Market?
faq.answer: The main products include fresh produce, meats, dairy, baked goods, and private label items.

faq.question: When was Village Super Market founded?
faq.answer: Village Super Market was founded in 1937.
